cause.description:
We are a student chapter on Amnesty International, school can create one if you go to their website. We want to raise 1,000 dollars, create opportunities for local artists to donate their work for a good cause and exposure, and we also will be getting bracelets and t-shirts.
1. There are two kinds of abuse: physical, and mental.
2. Women need to protect themselves and their children from verbal abuse as well as physical abuse.
3. We would like men to be involved to bring more sensitivity to the issue.
4. This is a global issue.
5. Our motto is "break the silence".
6. 1 in every 3 women will be abused/raped in her lifetime.
cause.mission: stop violence against women and children.
cause.name: STOP
